lines.text: The butler will show you to your tombs - er - rooms, gentlemen!
How are we checked for gas?
Well, the arrow's pointing halfway. I don't know whether its half empty or half full.
Yeah, and we can't see either!
What do you normally do when somebody mails you a bomb?
I don't know whether to call it a Sea-going Heli-tank, a Land-going Heli-sub, or an Airborne What-in-the-hell...
Great-grandfather built this house over 100 years ago.
No! Doesn't look a day over 98.
